name: Baal & Sezan
description: A great magician-turned-doll, and her faithful apprentice
story: Sezan was once a dark magician, until her body was destroyed in a forbidden summoning ceremony gone awry. Before her soul also perished, her apprentice Baal placed it inside a doll, and together they have embarked on a long journey to return her soul to a Human body.
get_line: If Sezan wishes it, we will go.

relations.description: While many are creeped out by Sezan and her doll body, Gloomyrain was fascinated.
Baal thinks that she resembles Sezan from before she became a doll, though she fails to live up to her in many aspects.
Baal harbors much hostility toward Tenebria, who almost took Sezan's life.
A boy who has a mutated arm. Sezan feels a kinship with others who were forced to make a sacrifice against their will.

specialty.name: Necromancer
specialty.description: Baal & Sezan don't back down easily; something in their hearts just won't let them.

skills.name: Dark Cloud
skills.description: Summons the Cloud of Darkness to attack all enemies, dealing damage proportional to the number of debuffs inflicted on the enemy. When the enemy is defeated by this attack, the cooldown for Last Requiem is reset.

skills.name: Last Requiem
skills.description: Baal & Sezan attack all enemies with Strike Magic, with a {{variable}} chance each to make them unhealable and inflict decreased Speed for 2 turns.
skills.enhanced_description: Baal & Sezan attack all enemies with Strike Magic, with a {{variable}} chance each to make them unhealable and inflict decreased Defense and Speed for 2 turns.

debuffs.name: Unhealable
debuffs.effect: Makes the target unable to be healed.

debuffs.name: Poison
debuffs.effect: Receives damage equivalent to 5% of max Health at the start of the turn.

skill1.name: 死霊顕現
skill1.desc: 対象を含む敵2体に攻撃し、35.0%の確率で毒を2ターンの間付与する。

skill2.name: 闇雲
skill2.desc: 敵全体に攻撃する。対象の弱体効果の数が多いほどダメージがUPする。このスキルで敵を気絶させた場合、【最期の鎮魂歌】のスキルターンが0になる。
skill2.soul_description: 敵全体に攻撃する。対象の弱体効果の数が多いほどダメージがUPする。このスキルで敵を気絶させた場合、【最期の鎮魂歌】のスキルターンが0になる。

skill3.name: 最期の鎮魂歌
skill3.desc: 敵全体に攻撃し、65.0%の確率で回復不可・スピードDOWNを2ターンの間付与する。
